definition[0]: very great and hard to control
example[1]: I was in a raging temper.
definition[1]: continuing strongly and showing no signs of ending
example[4]: The show was a raging success.
definition[2]: a raging headache etc is very painful
example[5]: Richard developed a raging headache and had to lie down.
example[6]: a raging fever  (=a very high body temperature)
definition[3]: continuing or moving with great natural force
example[9]: The fire had become a raging blaze.
